ValidationRule.description: Users cannot add Salsify Connector and Salsify Connector Setup products to New Business or Upsell Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business - Expansion Portal" ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo00000366c5IAA', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo00000366llIAA' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot add Salsify Connector or Salsify Connector Setup products to New business or Upsell opportunities. Please contact BizApps team or Product Marketing team to add the product to the opportunity.
